summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Eucharistic Miracles blog site. Backend APIs fully functional, frontend UI working with dark elegant theme, authentication flows working, admin dashboard operational, and all major features tested successfully.

fixed_issues.issue: Python syntax error using 'null' instead of 'None'

passed_tests: Homepage loads with hero section and dark elegant theme
Navigation bar with language selector working
Stats section showing miracle counts (4 total, 2 recognized, 2 investigating, 2 countries)
Filters section with country/century selects and investigating toggle
User registration flow creating new accounts
User login flow with test credentials
Admin dashboard displaying miracles table with edit/delete actions
Create new miracle form with tabbed interface
Bulk import JSON functionality with template download
About page with religious imagery and mission description
Legal pages (disclaimer, privacy, terms) with proper content
All API endpoints returning correct responses
Bulk import processing with success notifications
